extendedInfo.description: It's pool that fits your phone!  So simple, a caveman can play it. "It feels like I have an actual little pool table in my hands.  Wow!"- User CommentFeatures:* Full screen mini pool table.* Fantastic ball physics.* Balls you can actually see.* Balls that actually roll.* Overhead 3D with subtle tilt perspective for stunning lifelike feel.* Great sounds.* Arcade mode health system for solo play.* Unique shot difficulty based scoring.* Automatic saving. Always pick up where you left off.* Menus that hide when you aim and shoot for a full screen view.* Four table themes.Games:* Practice - Just shoot pool.  No health, no worries.* Solo Straight Pool - get health for made shots.  Lose it for misses.  Stay alive.* Solo Caveman Pool (RGB) - Ten balls, 4 red, 3 green, and 3 red.  Sink the balls in RGB order.Also Available:* Solo Nine Ball, Eight Ball, and Seven Ball.* Two Player Nine Ball, Eight Ball, and Seven Ball.* Eight additional table themes.Around the corner:* Global high scores.Send suggested features to support@exit4games.comSimilar: 3D Pool Master Pro Pool Mania Pool Master Deluxe Pool Master Mini Pool Carl's Pool Carl Pool Prodigy Billiards Touch Pool 2D Pool Break Pro Pool Rebel Doodle Pool Billiard_2D Billiard 2D Crazy Casino Ball.Hop Bowling Ball Hop Bowling zynga poker ping pong world champ super stickman golf duck hunter fishing game backetball shots let's golf Rocka bowling bubble blast sports beer pong darts free pool mania vegas pool sharks pool hd total pool pool bar 8ball total pool free 9 ball for all 3rilliards World Slots Wild Bingo Super Monsters Bingo Blingo slots royale Farm Casino
